author: brianlee
title: Connecting Tabletop Games & Cardano
description: Tabletop gaming and the physical collectible market is a prime target for integration with Cardano. This is an untapped market for Cardano.
solution: Start by integrating tabletop gamers with the idea of Cardano through themed physical games, then further integrate blockchain.
experience:
Artist & designer with 7 years of entertainment industry experience as an Art Director.
15 Years of experience with computers & programming
